name: V I R U S: The Videogame DEMO
name_original: V I R U S: The Videogame DEMO
description:
A deadly new virus has inflicted its first patient, and has the potential to become a pandemic. Your job is to save the patient through an experimental new technique...

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Interact

Enter - Skip Intro Dialogue

Alt + Enter: Fullscreen/Windowed Switching

This is a demo of the game. This project was cancelled, but we were able to create a demo that we hope y'all will enjoy.

Credits:

Ishaan Sinha | Design and Programming

Deen Saiyd | Story and Dialogue

Eliana Pinkerton | Art
